articles.author: Mohammed Babangida
articles.title: Police, NIS rescue 30 victims of human trafficking in Katsina, Kebbi - Premium Times
articles.description: Nigerian states sharing borders with Niger Republic are trafficking gateways of the brutal trafficking route across the Sahara Desert to Libya towards Europe.
articles.content:
The police and immigration personnel in Katsina and Kebbi have rescued 30 persons being trafficked across the state.
In separate statements on Friday, the victims confessed they were being trafficke… [+2701 chars]

articles.title: Ukraine nuclear plant on emergency generators after shelling cuts external power, UN says - CBC News
articles.description: Ukraine's Zaporizhzhia nuclear power plant, the biggest in Europe, has lost its last remaining external power source as a result of renewed shelling and is now relying on emergency diesel generators, the UN nuclear watchdog said Saturday.
articles.content: Ukraine's Zaporizhzhia nuclear power plant, the biggest in Europe, has lost its last remaining external power source as a result of renewed shelling and is now relying on emergency diesel generators,… [+1647 chars]

articles.author: NORA BULI, GWLADYS FOUCHE, Reuters
articles.title: In echo of Cold War, Nobel Peace Prize goes to Ukraine, Russia, Belarus rights campaigners - GMA News Online
articles.description: Jailed Belarusian activist Ales Byalyatski, Russian rights group Memorial and Ukraine's Center for Civil Liberties won the 2022 Nobel Peace Prize on Friday, amid a war in their region that is the worst conflict in Europe since World War Two.
articles.content: OSLO, Norway - Jailed Belarusian activist Ales Byalyatski, Russian rights group Memorial and Ukraine's Center for Civil Liberties won the 2022 Nobel Peace Prize on Friday, amid a war in their region … [+5283 chars]
